name: Highway Drag WebGL
description:
THIS IS THE MOBILE BROWSER PLAYABLE VERSION OF OUR CROSS-PLATFORM GAME

Turn On Landscape mode and its recommended to play only in Chrome or else you'll face many errors!

HIGHWAY DRAG is a free-to-play offline Cross-Platform Car Racing Game available on Android, Windows, MacOS and iOS.

MAIN GAME: Highway Drag by Gyann Dev (itch.io)
